q: COBRA primarily provides:
choices: Continuation of employer coverage after qualifying events
explain: COBRA allows qualified beneficiaries to continue group coverage.
why: COBRA processes prevent penalties and protect former employees from gaps.

q: HIPAA PHI refers to:
choices: Protected health information under privacy rules
explain: HIPAA governs privacy/security of PHI.
why: HIPAA safeguards PHI; violations erode trust and invite fines.

q: An SBC is:
explain: SBCs standardize plan info for comparison.
why: Accurate, timely notices reduce liability and confusion.
